role.argrole: amount increased by, EXT or MNR

example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS مدد) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الرئيس) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM الاميركي)) (NP (NOUN_PROP جورج) (NOUN_PROP بوش))) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC حال) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الطوارىء))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البلاد))) (NP-TMP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الجمعة))))
